sen.j: 能吏（のうり）とは政治的手腕、行政的手腕に優れた人物を指す。
sen.e: Nori means a person with high political or administrative skill.
Nori means a person with high political or administrative skill.
Nori means a person with high political or administrative skill.

sen.j: 古くは、古代中国の歴史書にその名をみることができる。
sen.e: Track it back through the history, the word can be found in historical texts of ancient China.
Tracking back through the history, the word can be found in historical texts of ancient China.
Tracking back through the history, the word can be found in historical texts of ancient China.

sen.j: 一般的に、名奉行・名宰相・賢侯などと言われるような人物が能吏である。
sen.e: Normally, those figures who are referred to as a excellent bugyo; a shogunate administrator, wonderful prime minister, or a wise marquis are nori.
Normally, those figures who are referred to as excellent bugyo (shogunate administrator), wonderful prime minister, or wise marquis are nori.
sen.cmt: 奉行の説明文にかっこをつけました。
sen.e: Normally, those figures who are referred to as excellent bugyo (shogunate administrator), wonderful prime minister, or wise marquis are nori.
